mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DRP_USER_MAST( USER_NO ,REV_DATE ,REV_TM ,SDATE ,ST_TM ,AREA_NM ,AREA_CD ,RUN_AREA_NM ,RUN_AREA_CD ,RUN_ORDER ,ROUTE_ID ,ROUTE_NM ,ROUTE_NMA ,ROUTE_DIR ,PLAT_NUM ,STTN_IN_NM ,STTN_OUT_NM ,STTN_IN_ID ,STTN_OUT_ID ,MAX_SEAT ,TOTAL_DIST ,TOTAL_TM ,USER_CNT ,USER_NM ,USER_PHONE ,REV_TYPE ,BOARDING_TM ) SELECT CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MMSS')),'U'), LPAD(USER_NO.NEXTVAL,3,0)) USER_NO ,SYSDATE ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MMSS') REV_TM ,SDATE ,#{ST_TM} ,A.AREA_NM ,A.AREA_CD ,A.RUN_AREA_NM ,A.RUN_AREA_CD ,RUN_ORDER ,A.ROUTE_ID ,ROUTE_NM ,ROUTE_NMA ,ROUTE_DIR ,PLAT_NUM ,STTN_IN_NM ,B.STTN_NM STTN_OUT_NM ,STTN_IN_ID ,STTN_OUT_ID ,MAX_USER MAX_SEAT ,#{TOTAL_DIST} TOTAL_DIST ,#{TOTAL_TM} TOTAL_TM ,#{USER_CNT} USER_CNT ,#{USER_NM} USER_NM ,#{USER_PHONE} USER_PHONE ,#{REV_TYPE} REV_TYPE ,#{BOARDING_TM} REV_TYPE FROM ( SELECT A.AREA_NM ,A.AREA_CD ,A.RUN_AREA_NM ,A.RUN_AREA_CD ,A.ROUTE_ID ,ROUTE_NM ,ROUTE_NMA ,ROUTE_DIR ,SDATE ,ST_TM ,RUN_ORDER ,PLAT_NUM ,MAX_USER ,STTN_IN_ID ,STTN_OUT_ID ,B.STTN_NM STTN_IN_NM FROM ( SELECT AREA_NM ,AREA_CD ,RUN_AREA_NM ,RUN_AREA_CD ,A.ROUTE_ID ,ROUTE_NM ,ROUTE_NMA ,ROUTE_DIR ,SDATE ,ST_TM ,RUN_ORDER ,PLAT_NUM ,MAX_USER ,#{STTN_IN_ID} STTN_IN_ID ,#{STTN_OUT_ID} STTN_OUT_ID FROM (SELECT AREA_NM ,AREA_CD ,RUN_AREA_NM ,RUN_AREA_CD ,ROUTE_ID ,ROUTE_NM ,ROUTE_NMA ,ROUTE_DIR FROM DRP_ROUTE) A, (SELECT SDATE ,ST_TM ,ROUTE_ID ,RUN_ORDER ,PLAT_NUM ,MAX_USER FROM DRP_ROUTE_SCHE) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ROUTE_ID = B.ROUTE_ID AND B.SDATE = TO_DATE(#{SDATE}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND B.ST_TM LIKE SUBSTR(#{ST_TM},1,2) || '%' AND A.ROUTE_ID = #{ROUTE_ID} AND A.ROUTE_DIR = #{ROUTE_DIR} ) A, DRP_STTN B WHERE 1=1 AND A.STTN_IN_ID = B.STTN_ID ) A, DRP_STTN B WHERE 1=1 AND A.STTN_OUT_ID = B.STTN_ID
